query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN notification_sound TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_vibration TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_approval_pending TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_workflow_completed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_workflow_failed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_system TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_email_enabled TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2ghn282qNtTBYRw.2c60fb684332 --database U7erxBowPGSR3wjYQtQi9z --execute ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN notification_sound TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_vibration TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_approval_pending TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_workflow_completed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_workflow_failed TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_system TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN notification_email_enabled TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1;
